name: Equilibrium (itch) (Trifecta5)
description:
Create the perfect defense matrix by finding all the right angles to stop an onslaught of enemies. See if you can survive all 3 waves in this arcade style shooter.

Created in 6 days by a solo developer as part of Epic Megajam 2022.  

I took "As above so below" to mean counterbalance. What's above should help what's below and same for right and left. The turrets are positioned in a diamond shape relative to one another and can fire into the other's lane. When one side gets overrun another turret, even on the opposite side, can reorient itself and help.  Above, below, right, and left must reach an equilibrium to win.
